snippet: To promote its new mascara, Lancôme has licensed the cartoon character Betty Boop and is pairing her in print and video ads with the model Daria Werbowy.
abstract: Advertising column notes L'Oreal's Lancome brand has licensed cartoon character Betty Boop and is pairing her in print and video ads with the model Daria Werbowy to promote its new Hypnose Star mascara.
lead_paragraph: To promote its new mascara, Lancôme has licensed the cartoon character Betty Boop and is pairing her in print and video ads with the model Daria Werbowy.

headline.seo: Lancôme Mascara Ads Feature Betty Boop
headline.main: Turning to a Screen Siren to Introduce a Mascara
headline.print_headline: Turning to a Screen Siren To Introduce a Mascara
